data.actual_result: The category collapses in an unsmooth 2 step way.
data.expected_result: The category collapses smoothly like it does after on.
data.short_description: Each first time muting a category and the first time only, it collapses the channels first causing the read channels in that category to collapse before the unread channels in an unsmooth way.
data.steps_to_repro: - Be in a server that has a category that contains both read and unread channels and that you haven't muted before - Mute that category
